query.pigql: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}";q  = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')")}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true" ;hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;hasArticle = group hasArticle by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "saqlgroup").asObject()}};hasArticle = foreach hasArticle generate "With Articles" as 'Cases',  avg('DurationCalculatedField') as 'avg_DurationCalculatedField', {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "query2").asObject()}};noArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' == 0;noArticle = group noArticle by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "saqlgroup").asObject()}};noArticle = foreach noArticle generate "Without Articles" as 'Cases',  avg('DurationCalculatedField') as 'avg_DurationCalculatedField',  {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "query2").asObject()}};u = union hasArticle, noArticle;u = foreach u generate 'Cases' as 'Cases', 'avg_DurationCalculatedField' as 'avg_DurationCalculatedField2',{{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "order").asObject()}} as {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "order").asObject()}}; u = order u by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "order").asObject()}};

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true" ; q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('${Constants.ClosedDate}_Year','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Month','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Day')")}};  hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;  c = group hasArticle by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "saqlgroup").asObject()}}, q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "saqlgroup").asObject()}}; c = foreach c generate count(hasArticle)/count(q) as 'avg_AttachedRate', {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "query").asObject()}}; c = group c by all; c = foreach c generate avg('avg_AttachedRate') as 'avg_AttachedRate';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}";
 q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('${Constants.ClosedDate}_Year','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Month','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Day')")}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true"; hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;  c = group hasArticle by 'Owner.Name', q by 'Owner.Name'; c = foreach c generate count(hasArticle)/count(q)  as 'avg_AttachedRate', hasArticle['Owner.Name'] as 'Owner.Name'; c = order c by 'avg_AttachedRate' {{cell(static_1.selection, 0, "value").asString()}};

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true" ; q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('${Constants.ClosedDate}_Year','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Month','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Day')")}};  hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;  c = group hasArticle by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "saqlgroup").asObject()}}, q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "saqlgroup").asObject()}}; c = foreach c generate count(hasArticle)/count(q) as 'avg_AttachedRate', {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "query").asObject()}};

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}";q  = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('${Constants.ClosedDate}_Year','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Month','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Day')")}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true" ;hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;hasArticle = group hasArticle by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "saqlgroup").asObject()}};hasArticle = foreach hasArticle generate "With Articles" as 'Cases',  avg('DurationCalculatedField') as 'avg_DurationCalculatedField', {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "query2").asObject()}};noArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' == 0;noArticle = group noArticle by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "saqlgroup").asObject()}};noArticle = foreach noArticle generate "Without Articles" as 'Cases',  avg('DurationCalculatedField') as 'avg_DurationCalculatedField',  {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "query2").asObject()}};u = union hasArticle, noArticle;u = order u by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "order").asObject()}};q2 = filter q by CSAT > -10;hasArticle2 = filter q2 by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;hasArticle2 = group hasArticle2 by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "saqlgroup").asObject()}};hasArticle2 = foreach hasArticle2 generate "With Articles" as 'Cases',  avg('CSAT') as 'avg_CSAT', {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "query2").asObject()}};noArticle2 = filter q2 by 'ArticleVersion' == 0;noArticle2 = group noArticle2 by  {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "saqlgroup").asObject()}};noArticle2 = foreach noArticle2 generate "Without Articles" as 'Cases',  avg('CSAT') as 'avg_CSAT',  {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "query2").asObject()}};u2 = union hasArticle2, noArticle2;u2 = order u2 by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "order").asObject()}};co = group u by ({{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "order").asObject()}}, 'Cases') full, u2 by ({{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "order").asObject()}}, 'Cases');co = foreach co generate sum(u['avg_DurationCalculatedField']) as 'avg_DurationCalculatedField', sum(u2['avg_CSAT']) as 'avg_CSAT', {{cell(static_2.selection, 0, "variable").asObject()}}[{{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "order").asObject()}}] as {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "order").asObject()}}, {{cell(static_2.selection, 0, "variable").asObject()}}['Cases'] as 'Cases';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q  = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('${Constants.ClosedDate}_Year','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Month','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Day')")}};  q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true" ; hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0; c = group hasArticle by all, q by all; c = foreach c generate count(hasArticle)/count(q) as 'avg_AttachedRate';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by IsClosed=="true"; q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('${Constants.ClosedDate}_Year','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Month','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Day')")}}; hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0; hasArticle = group hasArticle by all; hasArticle = foreach hasArticle generate "With Articles" as 'Cases',  avg('DurationCalculatedField') as 'avg_CaseDuration'; noArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' == 0; noArticle = group noArticle by all; noArticle = foreach noArticle generate "Without Articles" as 'Cases',  avg('DurationCalculatedField') as 'avg_CaseDuration'; u = group hasArticle by all, noArticle by all; u = foreach u generate -(sum(hasArticle['avg_CaseDuration'])-sum(noArticle['avg_CaseDuration']))/sum(noArticle['avg_CaseDuration'])*100 as 'avg_Percent';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}";
 q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('${Constants.ClosedDate}_Year','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Month','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Day')")}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true" ;  hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0; c = group hasArticle by '${Constants.CaseProduct}', q by '${Constants.CaseProduct}'; c = foreach c generate count(hasArticle)/count(q) as 'avg_AttachedRate', hasArticle['${Constants.CaseProduct}'] as '${Constants.CaseProduct}'; c = order c by 'avg_AttachedRate' {{cell(static_1.selection, 0, "value").asString()}};

step_ValuesTable.query: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('${Constants.ClosedDate}_Year','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Month','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Day')")}}; q = filter q by {{cell(Toggle_AttachedArticles.selection, 0, "saql").asObject()}}; q = foreach q generate 'CaseNumber', first('Account.Name') as 'Account.Name', ${Constants.CaseCSATQuery} ${Constants.CaseFCRQuery} first('${Constants.CaseType}') as '${Constants.CaseType}', first('Owner.Name') as 'Owner.Name', ${Constants.CaseSLAQuery} avg('${Constants.CaseDuration}') as 'avg_${Constants.CaseDuration}', first('${Constants.CaseOrigin}') as '${Constants.CaseOrigin}', first('${Constants.CaseSeverityLevel}') as '${Constants.CaseSeverityLevel}', first('${Constants.CaseStatus}') as '${Constants.CaseStatus}',   ${Constants.CaseSupportLevelQuery} first('IsEscalated') as 'Escalated'; q = limit q 100;

query.pigql: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('${Constants.ClosedDate}_Year','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Month','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Day')")}}; q = filter q by IsClosed=="true"; q = filter q by 'CSAT' > -10; hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0; hasArticle = group hasArticle by all; hasArticle = foreach hasArticle generate "With Articles" as 'Cases',  avg('CSAT') as 'avg_CSAT'; noArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' == 0; noArticle = group noArticle by all; noArticle = foreach noArticle generate "Without Articles" as 'Cases',  avg('CSAT') as 'avg_CSAT'; u = group hasArticle by all, noArticle by all; u = foreach u generate (sum(hasArticle['avg_CSAT'])-sum(noArticle['avg_CSAT']))/sum(noArticle['avg_CSAT'])*100 as 'avg_Percent';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}";
 q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('${Constants.ClosedDate}_Year','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Month','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Day')")}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true" ;  hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;  c = group hasArticle by '${Constants.CaseReason}', q by '${Constants.CaseReason}'; c = foreach c generate count(hasArticle)/count(q)  as 'avg_AttachedRate', hasArticle['${Constants.CaseReason}'] as '${Constants.CaseReason}'; c = order c by 'avg_AttachedRate' {{cell(static_1.selection, 0, "value").asString()}};
